nodes.text: Aaghra was the first planet from the star Zug in the Zug system of the galaxy's Core Worlds region, not far from Coruscant, the most politically important planet in galactic history. It was a moonless world of molten rock.
Aaghra was first mentioned briefly in part one of the Planet Hoppers article Aargau: For All Your Banking Needs, which was written by Cory J. Herndon and published on the Wizards.com website in 2003.
